Other Information.Additional Info: The micropore (<2.0 nm) of Cu3(HHTP)2 selectively accommodates small metabolites like glucose.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Simulated biofluid environment with high salinity (0.5 mol/L NaCl) and protein (5 mg/mL BSA)
Other Information.Additional Info: The micropore (<2.0 nm) excludes large-sized proteins such as BSA.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: High sensitivity and selectivity for small metabolites; LOD for glucose: 1 ng/mL

Other Information.Additional Info: The MOF nanofilm was fabricated on ITO glass using a layer-by-layer liquid-phase epitaxial spray approach. It exhibited enhanced ionization efficiency and excellent reproducibility.
